Key.Original: Waiting for players in the lobby to spawn...
Key.English: Waiting for players in the lobby to spawn...

Key.Original: Waiting for respawn...
Key.English: Waiting for respawn...

Key.Original: IFA - Desert Rats
Key.English: IFA - Desert Rats

Key.Original: The UK's Desert Rats have joined forces with US allies to fight the Germans in Libya.
Key.English: The UK's Desert Rats have joined forces with US allies to fight the Germans in Libya.

Key.Original: 01 Desert Shadows
Key.English: 01 Desert Shadows

Key.Original: A recon team is tasked to infiltrate a German base hidden in castle ruins and overlook an airfield.
Key.English: A recon team is tasked to infiltrate a German base hidden in castle ruins and overlook an airfield.

Key.Original: Mission Complete
Key.English: Mission Complete

Key.Original: All Objectives Complete
Key.English: All Objectives Complete

Key.Original:
Under the cover of darkness, our team infiltrated the enemy territory using stealth and precision. We made our way to a vantage point overlooking the airfield and began gathering vital intelligence on enemy aircraft movements, personnel positions, and security measures.

Once all charges were set, we retreated to a safe distance and remotely detonated the explosives, effectively destroying all identified enemy aircraft. The resulting explosions created chaos and confusion within the enemy ranks, providing us with an opportunity to make a swift escape.
Key.English:
Under the cover of darkness, our team infiltrated the enemy territory using stealth and precision. We made our way to a vantage point overlooking the airfield and began gathering vital intelligence on enemy aircraft movements, personnel positions, and security measures.

Once all charges were set, we retreated to a safe distance and remotely detonated the explosives, effectively destroying all identified enemy aircraft. The resulting explosions created chaos and confusion within the enemy ranks, providing us with an opportunity to make a swift escape.

Key.Original: That's close enough. Cut the lights...
Key.English: That's close enough. Cut the lights...

Key.Original: Listen up, lads! We've got ourselves a bloody important mission ahead. We're gonna infiltrate a newly constructed German base holed up in those castle ruins and get us a good view of that airfield.
Key.English: Listen up, lads! We've got ourselves a bloody important mission ahead. We're gonna infiltrate a newly constructed German base holed up in those castle ruins and get us a good view of that airfield.

Key.Original: Intelligence tells us those sneaky buggers have planted mines all around the airstrip, so we need to get inside that castle to get a clear view.
Key.English: Intelligence tells us those sneaky buggers have planted mines all around the airstrip, so we need to get inside that castle to get a clear view.

Key.Original: This mission may prove difficult if you don't keep your wits about you and stay hidden, but its ultimately your choice how you decide to get it done.
Key.English: This mission may prove difficult if you don't keep your wits about you and stay hidden, but its ultimately your choice how you decide to get it done.

Key.Original: Alright... Find a vantage point within the castle, a commanding position from which we can survey the airfield and gather crucial intelligence.
Key.English: Alright... Find a vantage point within the castle, a commanding position from which we can survey the airfield and gather crucial intelligence.

Key.Original: Shit, they have a lot of aircraft. If we attack with our tanks later, they will get slaughtered.
Key.English: Shit, they have a lot of aircraft. If we attack with our tanks later, they will get slaughtered.

Key.Original: We have no choice but to try and take them out. Figure out a way to destroy them.
Key.English: We have no choice but to try and take them out. Figure out a way to destroy them.

Key.Original: You are cleared to engage any and all forces. Out.
Key.English: You are cleared to engage any and all forces. Out.

Key.Original: Excellent work! That should eliminate any German aircraft in our later assault. Now, make it to the extraction zone and make it out of there alive!
Key.English: Excellent work! That should eliminate any German aircraft in our later assault. Now, make it to the extraction zone and make it out of there alive!

Key.Original: Infiltrate the German Base
Key.English: Infiltrate the German Base

Key.Original: Listen up, lads! We've got ourselves a bloody important mission ahead. We're gonna infiltrate a German base holed up in a blasted castle. Intelligence tells us those sneaky buggers have planted mines all around, so we need to get inside that castle to get a clear view of their precious airfield.
Key.English: Listen up, lads! We've got ourselves a bloody important mission ahead. We're gonna infiltrate a German base holed up in a blasted castle. Intelligence tells us those sneaky buggers have planted mines all around, so we need to get inside that castle to get a clear view of their precious airfield.

Key.Original: Observe the Airfield
Key.English: Observe the Airfield

Key.Original: Observe the airfield. Look for any key structures or vehicles present and report them to headquarters immediately.
Key.English: Observe the airfield. Look for any key structures or vehicles present and report them to headquarters immediately.

Key.Original: Destroy the FW190s
Key.English: Destroy the FW190s

Key.Original: The Germans have multiple battle-ready FW190s. If we don't do something about them, they will destroy our tank force easily. Get down there and destroy them.
Key.English: The Germans have multiple battle-ready FW190s. If we don't do something about them, they will destroy our tank force easily. Get down there and destroy them.

Key.Original: Escape
Key.English: Escape

Key.Original: Escape and return to base. Utilize any German vehicles you have found and get to the exfiltration zone.
Key.English: Escape and return to base. Utilize any German vehicles you have found and get to the exfiltration zone.

Key.Original: Situation
Key.English: Situation

Key.Original: Earlier this month, scouts have found that the Germans have been having increased activity in the area of Fort Marcuca. We suspect that the Germans have created a forward base inside of the castle have have constructed a makeshift airfield. We need to find what assets the Germans have brought to this base.
Key.English: Earlier this month, scouts have found that the Germans have been having increased activity in the area of Fort Marcuca. We suspect that the Germans have created a forward base inside of the castle have have constructed a makeshift airfield. We need to find what assets the Germans have brought to this base.

Key.Original: Rearm and repair complete...
Key.English: Rearm and repair complete...

Key.Original: Rearming and repairing...
Key.English: Rearming and repairing...

Key.Original: Mission Completed
Key.English: Mission Completed

Key.Original: All Targets Destroyed
Key.English: All Targets Destroyed

Key.Original:
I would like to extend my congratulations and appreciation to all of you for your exceptional performance in the recent mission. Our objectives were to neutralize the Landing Craft, Tiger Tanks, and Repair Trucks, and I'm pleased to inform you that we have accomplished this task with utmost precision and success.

The coordination and expertise displayed by each member of the team were truly commendable. Your unwavering dedication to the mission's objectives and the seamless execution of your duties have resulted in a resounding victory.

Your collective efforts not only eliminated the identified targets but also contributed significantly to weakening the enemy's capabilities and bolstering our own position on the battlefield.
Key.English:
I would like to extend my congratulations and appreciation to all of you for your exceptional performance in the recent mission. Our objectives were to neutralize the Landing Craft, Tiger Tanks, and Repair Trucks, and I'm pleased to inform you that we have accomplished this task with utmost precision and success.

The coordination and expertise displayed by each member of the team were truly commendable. Your unwavering dedication to the mission's objectives and the seamless execution of your duties have resulted in a resounding victory.

Your collective efforts not only eliminated the identified targets but also contributed significantly to weakening the enemy's capabilities and bolstering our own position on the battlefield.

Key.Original: 02 Desert Thunder
Key.English: 02 Desert Thunder

Key.Original: After the destruction of the German airforce, American P-47s attack key German assets.
Key.English: After the destruction of the German airforce, American P-47s attack key German assets.

Key.Original: Gentlemen, we have identified three high-value ground targets in your area of operation. I repeat, three targets.
Key.English: Gentlemen, we have identified three high-value ground targets in your area of operation. I repeat, three targets.

Key.Original: Your primary objectives are as follows: A set of Landing Craft, Tiger Tanks, and a few Repair Trucks.
Key.English: Your primary objectives are as follows: A set of Landing Craft, Tiger Tanks, and a few Repair Trucks.

Key.Original: The threat level is moderate. We have reports of anti-aircraft artillery in the vicinity. Exercise caution and maintain situational awareness.
Key.English: The threat level is moderate. We have reports of anti-aircraft artillery in the vicinity. Exercise caution and maintain situational awareness.

Key.Original: That's the last of the landers. Strong work!
Key.English: That's the last of the landers. Strong work!

Key.Original: No more Tiger tanks! The boys on the ground will be greatful.
Key.English: No more Tiger tanks! The boys on the ground will be greatful.

Key.Original: The trucks have been destroyed. No more mobile repairs for German armor.
Key.English: The trucks have been destroyed. No more mobile repairs for German armor.

Key.Original: All objectives complete, return to base. The brits want to begin their final assault.
Key.English: All objectives complete, return to base. The brits want to begin their final assault.

Key.Original: Destroy Repair Trucks
Key.English: Destroy Repair Trucks

Key.Original: The Germans have a few repair trucks at a nearby facility. Destroy them.
Key.English: The Germans have a few repair trucks at a nearby facility. Destroy them.

Key.Original: Destroy Tiger Tanks
Key.English: Destroy Tiger Tanks

Key.Original: Four Tiger tanks have been spotted at a German controlled fort. Destroy them.
Key.English: Four Tiger tanks have been spotted at a German controlled fort. Destroy them.

Key.Original: Destroy Landers
Key.English: Destroy Landers

Key.Original: The Germans have a number of troop transport landers at their docks. Destroy them.
Key.English: The Germans have a number of troop transport landers at their docks. Destroy them.

Key.Original: 03 Iron Hammer
Key.English: 03 Iron Hammer

Key.Original: British armor advances on German strongholds.
Key.English: British armor advances on German strongholds.

Key.Original: Mission Complete
Key.English: Mission Complete

Key.Original: All Strongholds Captured
Key.English: All Strongholds Captured

Key.Original: The objective of this operation was to capture German strongholds and neutralize enemy tanks in the designated area. The mission was executed with utmost precision and success, resulting in the capture of the strongholds and the defeat of enemy tanks.
Key.English: The objective of this operation was to capture German strongholds and neutralize enemy tanks in the designated area. The mission was executed with utmost precision and success, resulting in the capture of the strongholds and the defeat of enemy tanks.

Key.Original: Alright, its time for the assault on the German strongholds! With the German air force out of the picture, and the Tiger tanks destroyed, we can advance on the strongholds which will allow our infantry to successfully capture Tobruk in the coming weeks.
Key.English: Alright, its time for the assault on the German strongholds! With the German air force out of the picture, and the Tiger tanks destroyed, we can advance on the strongholds which will allow our infantry to successfully capture Tobruk in the coming weeks.

Key.Original: The Germans still have many remaining Panzer Fours and anti-tank guns so expect heavy resistance. Eliminate the threats at the strongholds.
Key.English: The Germans still have many remaining Panzer Fours and anti-tank guns so expect heavy resistance. Eliminate the threats at the strongholds.

Key.Original: Great work! That's all of the strongholds! Tobruk is ours!
Key.English: Great work! That's all of the strongholds! Tobruk is ours!

Key.Original: Capture King's Cross
Key.English: Capture King's Cross

Key.Original:
German infantry and anti-tank units have reinforced themselves at King's Cross. Eliminate all threats or be present in greater numbers.

You may need to mobilize on foot!
Key.English:
German infantry and anti-tank units have reinforced themselves at King's Cross. Eliminate all threats or be present in greater numbers.

You may need to mobilize on foot!

Key.Original: Capture German Strongholds
Key.English: Capture German Strongholds

Key.Original:
There are three German strongholds near the bay. Eliminate all threats or be present in larger numbers at all three sites.

You may need to mobilize on foot!
Key.English:
There are three German strongholds near the bay. Eliminate all threats or be present in larger numbers at all three sites.

You may need to mobilize on foot!

Key.Original:
Dear Diary,

Today is a momentous day for the British Desert Rats and the entire Allied forces. As I sit here in my tent, I can feel the energy and anticipation building up within our ranks. Today marks the beginning of our mission to launch a decisive attack on German strongholds alongside our trusted allied armor. The fate of this operation rests heavily on our shoulders, and I cannot help but feel a mix of excitement and apprehension as we prepare for what lies ahead.

Our mission is no small feat. We aim to break through the enemy lines and liberate the occupied territories, bringing an end to the tyrannical grip of the Axis powers. The outcome of this assault will undoubtedly shape the course of the war. Every soldier under my command understands the gravity of the task at hand, and their determination is unwavering.

Today, we will march forward with a sense of purpose and unity, each step bringing us closer to our objective. The sound of the tanks rumbling, the camaraderie shared among soldiers, and the steadfast support of our allies will be the backbone of our operation. We will face the enemy head-on, ready to overcome any obstacle that stands in our way.

Commander Alexander Campbell
Key.English:
Dear Diary,

Today is a momentous day for the British Desert Rats and the entire Allied forces. As I sit here in my tent, I can feel the energy and anticipation building up within our ranks. Today marks the beginning of our mission to launch a decisive attack on German strongholds alongside our trusted allied armor. The fate of this operation rests heavily on our shoulders, and I cannot help but feel a mix of excitement and apprehension as we prepare for what lies ahead.

Our mission is no small feat. We aim to break through the enemy lines and liberate the occupied territories, bringing an end to the tyrannical grip of the Axis powers. The outcome of this assault will undoubtedly shape the course of the war. Every soldier under my command understands the gravity of the task at hand, and their determination is unwavering.

Today, we will march forward with a sense of purpose and unity, each step bringing us closer to our objective. The sound of the tanks rumbling, the camaraderie shared among soldiers, and the steadfast support of our allies will be the backbone of our operation. We will face the enemy head-on, ready to overcome any obstacle that stands in our way.

Commander Alexander Campbell
